name: OncoTextFilter

infos.name: Suchfeld im Filter (Freitextsuche)
infos.description:
Freitext-Such-Filter

Ermöglichen Sie Ihren Kunden eine neue Dimension des Filterns

Mit unserem neuen Freitextfilter ermöglichen Sie es Ihren Kunden in Sekundenbruchteilen das zu finden, was sie suchen. Kein langes Blättern durch Kategorieseiten mehr - ein einfaches Stichwort genügt und der passende Artikel wird angezeigt.
infos.shortDescription: Ermöglicht es Ihren Kunden in einer Kategorie mit eigenen Suchbegriffen zu filtern. Dadurch sind höchst individuelle Navigationswege im Filter möglich.
infos.highlights: einfache und schnelle Navigation zum richtigen Artikel

infos.name: Search Term Input Filter
infos.description:
Search Term Input Filter

The new dimension of filtering

With our new free text filter you enable your customers to find what they are looking for in a split second. No more long scrolling through category pages - a simple keyword is enough and the matching article is displayed.
infos.shortDescription: Enables your customers to filter in a category with their own search terms. This allows highly individual navigation paths in the filter theraby boosting your conversion rate.

comments.text:
First it's offered as a free plugin, 
as mentioned on the page, and the readme file 

-# Shopware Product Listing Freetext filter
This plugin adds a freetext filter to the default product listing,
so the user is able to search for their keywords directly within the listing.

-The new dimension of filtering
With our new free text filter you enable your customers to find what they are looking for in a split second. No more long scrolling through category pages - a simple keyword is enough and the matching article is displayed.

And now asking a price of 60 euro to buy? not really customer friendly, no way of changing the layout using a configurator, 

If someone wants to make a better version of this, i am happy to switch.
comments.headline: Pricing?
